questions.promptMd: Which combination MOST visibly signals reliability to external stakeholders?

answers.contentMd: Predictable update cadence + public changelog + clear SLAs
answers.feedbackMd: Cadence and artifacts make reliability observable.
Irregular and non‑committal signals are weak.

questions.promptMd: True or False: Visibility of process (how you work) can improve trust even before outcomes are delivered.
questions.rationaleMd: Process transparency as a trust driver.

answers.feedbackMd: Correct. Process signals reduce uncertainty about delivery risk.
Outcomes matter, but process visibility helps earlier.

questions.promptMd: A team misses a milestone. Which response MOST preserves reputation?

answers.contentMd: Own the miss, explain impact, present a realistic new plan with checkpoints
Downplay the miss and hope no one notices
Promise to make it up later without dates

questions.promptMd: True or False: Responsiveness SLAs should be private to avoid accountability pressure.

answers.feedbackMd: Public SLAs set expectations and signal commitment.
